item.title: Introduction to `knitr`
item.description: Programs are meant to be read by humans and only incidentally for computers to execute. Donald Knuth Motivation The cut-and-paste approach to report production is tedious, slow, and error-prone. It can be very harmful to reproducible research and it is inconvenient to reproduce results. knitr is an R package that integrates computing and reporting. By incorporating code into text documents, the analysis, results and discussion are all in one place.
